name: Organic Matter (killbot2007, gem-world)
description:
Organic Matter

oh to be a mushroom.....

just the simple life of an indescribable force that plays a crucial role by breaking down dead organic matter. 

Think about it- their role is to recycle, death in itself. where your life ends, theirs is only growing..

WASD or Arrows to Move

Shift to Sprint

LMB to use spore RADAR

You are a sentient mushroom that must find organic matter to grow larger.

**look out for our official release**
